job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: helloltbrgt ltbrgtgreetingsltbrgt ltbrgtthis is akash kumar from vbeyond corp we are a global recruitment company with specialization in of hiring of it professionals one of our clients is looking for sr site reliability engineerltbrgtin remoteltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgttitle sr site reliability engineerltbrgtltbrgtlocation remoteltbrgtltbrgtfull timeltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtjob description ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt multicloud operations and support following industry best practices eg aws wellarchitected framework and direct experience in atscale administration troubleshooting and issue remediation in public and regulated cloud environments aws aws govcloud gcp azure azurejediltbrgt years cicd and infrastructure automation experience with common platforms jenkins spinnaker gitops and scripting terraform pulimi cloudformation ansible helm pythonltbrgt selfmotivated individual who is interested in expanding their knowledge and skillset while improving on processes procedures and approaches that benefit the organizationltbrgt a thoughtful individual who strives to find the best possible solutions to problems and the followthrough to see them from idea to executionltbrgt reliable team player yet able to work independently with strong interpersonal and communication skills ltbrgt at least years of handson experience in docker amp kubernetes familiarity with kops is an advantageltbrgt experience with big data domain technologies such as hdfs s bspark bflink presto kafka is essential and deep knowledge is a strong advantageltbrgt team player yet able to work independently with interpersonal and communication skills ltbrgti would appreciate if you could reach out on my below mentioned contact coordinates should the position be of interest to you ltbrgthave a great day aheadltbrgtltbrgt
